title: 360 - For When You Feel Like Giving Up (Return to ART ISLAND)

itunes:title: 360 - For When You Feel Like Giving Up (Return to ART ISLAND)
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
We’re living through some hard times – but that doesn’t mean that they don’t have the opportunity to really, really matter.

In this episode, we’re going back to THE CURSE OF ART ISLAND from Episode 202! 

For me, the creative career path is a roller coaster. There are so many circumstantial and emotional ups and downs, and if you ride every twist and turn, it can be exhausting and discouraging. Sometimes, I almost feel like this road is somehow cursed even!!!

When you’re hitting obstacles and setbacks, you just might be onto something!

My hope in revisiting the themes in this episode is that you’re able to find a renewed sense of creative fortitude to help you dig in when times get tough.
